en_US.project_summary: UTXOSwap is the first decentralized exchange (DEX) based on the RGB++ Layer, designed to unlock asset liquidity across all UTXO chains through intent-based trading, bridgeless leap, and smart contract.

zh_CN.project_summary: UTXOSwap 是首个基于 RGB++ Layer 的去中心化交易平台(DEX)，旨在通过意图交易、无桥跨链和智能合约技术，为所有 UTXO 链提供资产流动性解决方案。
